title: SUPER Fan, Would love some more Updates
text:
Absolutely love this game. It’s the whole App game to have ever captured my interest in the way it does. I play before bed and dream of sussing out impostors. 

Would LOVE to see :
-EVEN more customization, especially clothing wise
-Mega Maps with 20-30 people with maybe 4-5 imp maximums
-More intricate roles. Both for Crew and Impostor. 
-In Game Proximity Chat. We have ‘Free Chat’ and ‘Quick Chat’, would LOVE to see voice chat. (With consideration to ages of player accounts of course)

title: Love game some stuff to say
text:
Hi this game is really good and I love it a lot. Just some stuff I wanna say. I think you should be able to get stars easier like maybe you can get stars from playing the game or doing something in the game but that are used as like rare currency and not purchase only currency. Purchasing stars is also kinda not working for me too. Also I really want you to make a map called titan wich is the name of Saturn’s biggest moon. It has water which is peculiar so there could be a task to collect water. It would be mostly an underground base (there needs to be a bathroom. I’ve always wondered WHERE DO WE PEE ON SKEILD IF THERES NO BATHROOM pls also have greenhouse too) but there is an above ground observation deck. You would be able to go outside of the base and go to the water/ice, there would be rocks (mine rocks task?), craters, and see a cryovolcano (a task that involves Ammonia in the air?). In the sky you would be able to faintly see Saturn (titan has a dense atmosphere). I really want the ziplines on fungle to be used but we will see. Please add this I love titan so much and would love to see this as a map. Also can you guys add the wolf ears back or no idk much about that but I kinda want them back.
So yeah those are my thoughts. Uh bye.
